business.headline: Swiggy IPO opens today: Is it worth subscribing? All you need to knowAs Swiggy's IPO opens for subscription, investors must decide: will this food delivery giant serve up solid returns or leave them disappointed?

Onion prices to drop in 3-4 days; steps taken to boost pulse productionThe red onion crop is already reaching Nashik mandi and onions from Alwar are set to arrive in Delhi and other northern markets by Tuesday.

Sensex, Nifty rebound sharply as financial stocks gain amid volatilityThe NSE Nifty 50 rose 217.95 to end at 24,213.3, while the BSE Sensex gained 694.39 points, closing at 79,476.63. Both benchmarks had fallen by about 0.6% during the session before a strong rally in the final hours of trading.

Ola Electric shares tumble 8% to fall below IPO price. Buy, sell or hold?Ola Electric Mobility's share price dropped 8% in today's session, falling below its IPO price as the three-month lock-in period expired.

Swiggy IPO: Should you subscribe as GMP declines ahead of opening? Swiggy IPO: Some brokerages recommend subscription, arguing that the pricing appears fair in comparison to competitors, while others caution against investing due to the company's reported negative cash flows and ongoing losses.

Premier Energies share price jumps nearly 7% today. Know whyPremier Energies share price has risen 37% since getting listed on the stock market in September.

Explained: Why Orient Technologies share price jumped 16% today The jump in share price follows the company's announcement of a board meeting scheduled for November 11, 2024, where directors will review the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2024.

Why Maruti Suzuki is counting on lakhs of weddings in NovemberWith impressive sales figures from October, Maruti Suzuki is optimistic that the upcoming wedding season will sustain its sales momentum in November.

Explained: Why IRCTC share price dipped in early trade after Q2 resultsIRCTC's share price fell as much as 3% in early trade before making a comeback. At 10:40 am, shares of IRCTC were trading 0.82% higher at Rs 822.90.

Sensex, Nifty dip as investors remain cautious ahead of US electionsThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 125.73 points to 78,656.51 at 10:17 am, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 36.20 points to trade at 23,959.15 points.

Sensex, Nifty tumble ahead of US elections; Hero MotoCorp falls 4%The NSE Nifty 50 dropped by 321.20 points to settle at 23,983.15, while the BSE Sensex fell 941.88 points to 78,782.24. Most of the broader market indices also declined sharply during the session.

Reliance Jio IPO likely in 2025, retail arm to debut much later: Report Reliance Jio IPO: The company is targeting a 2025 listing for Jio, although the retail unit's IPO is expected to follow later due to internal operational priorities.

Donald Trump vs Kamala Harris: How US elections may impact Indian stock marketWith the US election just a day away, Indian markets prepare for shifts across sectors from tech to oil. What could this high-stakes race mean for investors on Dalal Street?

Stock market crash: Adani Ports, Reliance, Bajaj Auto among top losers Market crash: The bloodbath on Dalal Street can be attributed to a combination of factors, including a disappointing Q2 earnings season, heightened caution ahead of the upcoming US presidential elections, and persistent selling by foreign institutional investors (FIIs).
US presidential elections cause market turbulence as investors grow waryThe US elections are affecting the share market, with significant impacts on bond yields and investor caution.

Panic grips Dalal Street: 4 factors behind today's stock market crashStock market today: Both benchmark indices fell as much as 2%, leading to massive losses for investors. At 12:57 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 1,303.19 points at 78,420.93, while the NSE Nifty50 tanked 437.15 points to trade at 23,867.20.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Donald Trump on a roll with wins in Texas, 15 states, Kamala Harris trailsUS Election Result 2024: Republican Donald Trump takes a strong lead with projected wins in 19 states, securing 198 electoral votes. Vice President Kamala Harris trails with 109 electoral votes, facing an uphill battle as results roll in.

Live: Advantage Trump in most swing states; leads Harris by 198 electoral votesUS Presidential Election Result Live Updates: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump, the two contenders for the 2024 US presidential election, wrapped up their electoral campaigns on Monday night, paving the way for Americans to cast their ballots in one of the most anticipated polls in the country. While Trump, the Republican contender, is attempting to win a second stint at the White House, Harris -- the incumbent Vice President and Democratic nominee -- is vying to create history by becoming first female President of the US. The 7 battleground states of Arizona, Nevada, Georgia, North Carolina, Wisconsin, Michigan and Pennsylvania will play a key role in deciding the fate of Harris and Trump. The two will need at least 270 electoral votes to win the presidency. Voting began at 4.30 pm (IST) on Tuesday and will continue until around 6.30 am (IST) on Wednesday morning. Follow indiatoday.in for live updates on the presidential election.

Florida voters reject ballot measure to overturn state's 6-week abortion banThe Florida measure failed to clear the required 60% voter approval threshold to pass constitutional amendments in Florida. Most states require a simple majority.

Netanyahu fires Israel Defence Minister Yoav Gallant over 'crisis of trust'Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has dismissed Defence Minister Yoav Gallant over a "crisis of trust" and appointed Foreign Minister Israel Katz to succeed him as the new Defence Minister.

Kamala Harris, because of course: Actor Anne Hathaway backs Democrat in US pollsShe indicated through an image of a selection of headlines that she was voting due to the controversy surrounding abortion, an issue that Kamala Harris had prioritised and highlighted in her election campaign.

Live: Donald Trump now leads Kamala Harris in key swing statePennsylvania Election Results 2024: With 19 electoral votes, Pennsylvania becomes the critical battleground for Republican Donald Trump and Democrat Kamala Harris. This Rust Belt seat is the largest and most hotly contested of the swing states, pivotal for both candidates' paths to the White House. Trump's return campaign has focused on revitalising his 2016 strategies that secured wins in key states, while Harris has aimed to solidify the Democratic stronghold established by President Joe Biden in 2020. As the nation watches closely for the outcome, stay tuned to IndiaToday.in as we bring all the latest from Pennsylvania.

When will we know who has won?US election results 2024: While November 5 may be Election Day, a final picture could take days or weeks to emerge due to the neck-and-neck contest between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump. Here is a complete guide.

Swiggy IPO opens today: Is it worth subscribing? All you need to knowAs Swiggy's IPO opens for subscription, investors must decide: will this food delivery giant serve up solid returns or leave them disappointed?

How Trump and Kamala Harris vied for Hindu votes in razor-thin US pollBoth Republican leader Donald Trump's campaign and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris's campaign have actively worked to gain the support of Hindu voters in the closely fought US Presidential Election.

Sathyabama's RISE - Building a Stronger FutureSathyabama Institute of Science and Technology stands out as a beacon of educational excellence and social responsibility. Under the visionary leadership of Chancellor Dr. Mariazeena Johnson, this institution is redefining what it means to be a premier university in India, transforming lives through both world-class education and impactful community initiatives.

Live: Donald Trump leads over Kamala Harris in early trends from GeorgiaGeorgia Election Results 2024 Live Updates: The 2024 presidential election in Georgia has been a highly contested race between former President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris. As one of the pivotal swing states, Georgia's 16 electoral votes are crucial for both candidates. Trump has focused his campaign on issues such as the economy, immigration, and crime, while Harris has emphasized improving the care economy, protecting abortion rights, and safeguarding democracy. The nation eagerly awaits the outcome in Georgia, which could play a decisive role in determining the next President of the United States. Follow IndiaToday.in for live updates.

Over 70% US voters say American democracy under threat, exit poll revealsAccording to national exit poll data from Edison Research, nearly 75% of voters in Tuesday's presidential election between Democrat Kamala Harris and Republican Donald Trump viewed American democracy as under threat.

Indian Gen Z men in US are ditching desi Kamala. This is whyGen Z Indian-American voters find Donald Trump, who talks about restricting immigration, more appealing than Kamala Harris, whose mother emigrated from India. This is why young Indians casting their votes in the 2024 US presidential election are disillusioned with Harris.

Trump doubts EVMs in US polls, says he will concede defeat to Kamala Harris if...While speaking to reporters after casting his vote in Florida, Donald Trump criticised the use of voting machines, claiming that they not only inflate costs but also create delays in determining results.

Anger against Khalistanis spills onto Canada streets; Hindus, Sikhs uniteThe Indian community in Canada has taken a united stand against Khalistanis who attacked devotees at a Hindu temple in Brampton. In a rare show of strength, Hindus and Sikhs gathered in solidarity and protested, by blocking roads and sloganeering.

What Supreme Court's verdict implies for property rights in IndiaCurbing government control over private property under Article 39(b) of the Constitution, the court ruled that not all private assets qualified as "material resources of the community"

Zomato delivery man works 6 hours on Diwali night, earns Rs 317. Video sparks discussionThe Zomato agent worked on October 31 from 5pm to 11pm and delivered eight orders as seen in a video that he shared on Instagram.

Air India lacks competent managers: P Chidambaram slams airline over flight delayFormer Finance Minister P Chidambaram criticised Air India over the Delhi-Chennai flight delay where passengers were forced to wait for 15 minutes on the aero bridge at the aircraft door after boarding.

Live: Harris leads Trump in very early trends in North CarolinaNorth Carolina Election Result 2024 Live Updates: The 2024 presidential election in North Carolina has been a highly anticipated contest between Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris. As a pivotal battleground state with 16 electoral votes, North Carolina's outcome is crucial in influencing the overall election results. Trump's campaign has centred on the economy, immigration, and crime, while Harris has emphasised strengthening the care economy, protecting abortion rights, and defending democratic values. Stay tuned for more updates on IndiaToday.in.

Kamala Harris leads Donald Trump in early trends in MichiganMichigan Election Results 2024 Live Updates: The Rust Belt state of Michigan saw a fierce contest between Republican Donald Trump and Democrat Kamala Harris. As a key battleground state with 15 electoral votes, Michigan's outcome is pivotal in determining the overall result of the closely fought election. The state in the former heartland of the US manufacturing industry supported Democrats from 1992 until 2016, when it chose a Republican president. In 2024, it went with the Democrats again. As the country waits for the decisive poll outcome, stay tuned to IndiaToday.in for live updates.

How urban India is learning to live with air pollutionAir purifiers are entering poorer homes even as dark humour online pegs health insurance for pollution-related distress as the new normal in future

Navratilova reacts to 'leaked medical report'Media reports alleged that Algerian boxer Imane Khelif, a Paris Olympics champion, is biologically male based on leaked medical findings. The reports claim Khelif possesses XY chromosomes and male anatomical characteristics, sparking renewed debate about her eligibility to compete in women's boxing.

Confident of Trump's win, but Democrats capable of cheating: Rudy GiulianiSpeaking to India Today TV, Rudy Giuliani expressed confidence about Donald Trump's victory, but raised fears of alleged Democratic tactics, claiming they could 'cheat' to win the US election.

Jeddah to host IPL 2025 auction on November 24 and 25 after late venue changeAfter a last-minute venue change, the Saudi Arabian city Jeddah has been chosen to host the Indian Premier League 2025 mega auction. The much-anticipated auction will be held on November 24 and 25.

Singer Sharda Sinha's son mourns mother's death, funeral to take place in Patna Singer Sharda Sinha died on November 5 at Delhi's AIIMS Hospital. Her son, Anshuman, shared that her funeral will be held in Patna.

Pics: SRK guards his new look, son Aryan avoids paps as they dub for MufasaShah Rukh Khan and son Aryan Khan were seen at a dubbing studio last night, November 5. The two are dubbing for Mufasa: The Lion King.

sports.headline: Manchester United cannot play the way Sporting CP does: New boss Ruben AmorimRuben Amorim has claimed that he cannot transport one reality to another and said that Manchester United cannot play the way Sporting CP does. Sporting thrashed Manchester City 4-1 in the Champions League on November 5, Tuesday.

Inglis takes over from Pat Cummins, leading a squad bolstered by new inclusions.

Ruben Amorim's Sporting thrash Manchester City, AC Milan beat Real MadridRuben Amorim got a perfect home send off by Sporting CP as they thrashed Manchester City 4-1, courtesy of a Victor Gyokeres hat-trick. Real Madrid's poor form in the Champions League continued on November 5, Tuesday as they were beaten 3-1 by AC Milan.

ICC successfully trials AI tool to curb abuse in women's cricket The ICC has completed a ground-breaking AI-powered social media moderation trial to eliminate abuse in the women's game. The trial was conducted during the T20 Women's World Cup in the UAE.

All-round team effort helps U Mumba seal win over Dabang Delhi K.C.U Mumba clinched a thrilling win over Dabang Delhi K.C., with standout performances from Amirmohammad Zafardanesh, Manjeet, and Rohit Raghav sealing a 32-26 victory, despite a fierce comeback attempt from Yogesh and Ashu Malik in the final moments.

Djokovic withdraws from ATP Finals with 'ongoing injury'  Novak Djokovic has withdrawn from the upcoming ATP Finals 2024 in Turin after he failed to recover from an 'ongoing injury'. Djokovic also did not take part in the Paris Masters.

Afro-Asia Cup set to return after almost two decadesThe Afro-Asia Cup is set to be revived after almost two decades. Asia XI, which included Zaheer Khan, Yuvraj Singh, Shoaib Akhtar and Mohammed Asif, won the tournament back in 2007.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
